                              <div class="line">you our voices heartily.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fourth Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">You have received many wounds for your country.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not seal your knowledge with showing them. I</div>
                              <div class="line">will make much of your voices, and so trouble you no further.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Both Citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">The gods give you joy, sir, heartily!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Most sweet voices!</div>
                              <div class="line">Better it is to die, better to starve,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than crave the hire which first we do deserve.</div>
                              <div class="line">Why in this woolvish toge should I stand here,</div>
                              <div class="line">To beg of Hob and Dick, that do appear,</div>
                              <div class="line">Their needless vouches? Custom calls me to't:</div>
                              <div class="line">What custom wills, in all things should we do't,</div>
                              <div class="line">The dust on antique time would lie unswept,</div>
                              <div class="line">And mountainous error be too highly heapt</div>
                              <div class="line">For truth to o'er-peer. Rather than fool it so,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let the high office and the honour go</div>
                              <div class="line">To one that would do thus. I am half through;</div>
                              <div class="line">The one part suffer'd, the other will I do.</div>
                              <p>Re-enter three Citizens more</p>
                              <div class="line">Here come more voices.</div>
                              <div class="line">Your voices: for your voices I have fought;</div>
                              <div class="line">Watch'd for your voices; for Your voices bear</div>
                              <div class="line">Of wounds two dozen odd; battles thrice six</div>
                              <div class="line">I have seen and heard of; for your voices have</div>
                              <div class="line">Done many things, some less, some more your voices:</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed I would be consul.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Sixth Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">He has done nobly, and cannot go without any honest</div>
                              <div class="line">man's voice.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Seventh Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore let him be consul: the gods give him joy,</div>
                              <div class="line">and make him good friend to the people!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">All Citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">Amen, amen. God save thee, noble consul!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Worthy voices!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter MENENIUS, with BRUTUS and SICINIUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You have stood your limitation; and the tribunes</div>
                              <div class="line">Endue you with the people's voice: remains</div>
                              <div class="line">That, in the official marks invested, you</div>
                              <div class="line">Anon do meet the senate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this done?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">The custom of request you have discharged:</div>
                              <div class="line">The people do admit you, and are summon'd</div>
                              <div class="line">To meet anon, upon your approbation.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Where? at the senate-house?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">There, Coriolanus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">May I change these garments?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You may, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">That I'll straight do; and, knowing myself again,</div>
                              <div class="line">Repair to the senate-house.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll keep you company. Will you along?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">We stay here for the people.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Fare you well.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt CORIOLANUS and MENENIUS</p>
                              <div class="line">He has it now, and by his looks methink</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis warm at 's heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">With a proud heart he wore his humble weeds.</div>
                              <div class="line">will you dismiss the people?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter Citizens</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, my masters! have you chose this man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">He has our voices, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">We pray the gods he may deserve your loves.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">Amen, sir: to my poor unworthy notice,</div>
                              <div class="line">He mock'd us when he begg'd our voices.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">Certainly</div>
                              <div class="line">He flouted us downright.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">No,'tis his kind of speech: he did not mock us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">Not one amongst us, save yourself, but says</div>
                              <div class="line">He used us scornfully: he should have show'd us</div>
                              <div class="line">His marks of merit, wounds received for's country.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, so he did, I am sure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">No, no; no man saw 'em.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">He said he had wounds, which he could show</div>
                              <div class="line">in private;</div>
                              <div class="line">And with his hat, thus waving it in scorn,</div>
                              <div class="line">'I would be consul,' says he: 'aged custom,</div>
                              <div class="line">But by your voices, will not so permit me;</div>
                              <div class="line">Your voices therefore.' When we granted that,</div>
                              <div class="line">Here was 'I thank you for your voices: thank you:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your most sweet voices: now you have left</div>
                              <div class="line">your voices,</div>
                              <div class="line">I have no further with you.' Was not this mockery?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why either were you ignorant to see't,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or, seeing it, of such childish friendliness</div>
                              <div class="line">To yield your voices?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Could you not have told him</div>
                              <div class="line">As you were lesson'd, when he had no power,</div>
                              <div class="line">But was a petty servant to the state,</div>
                              <div class="line">He was your enemy, ever spake against</div>
                              <div class="line">Your liberties and the charters that you bear</div>
                              <div class="line">I' the body of the weal; and now, arriving</div>
                              <div class="line">A place of potency and sway o' the state,</div>
                              <div class="line">If he should still malignantly remain</div>
                              <div class="line">Fast foe to the plebeii, your voices might</div>
                              <div class="line">Be curses to yourselves? You should have said</div>
                              <div class="line">That as his worthy deeds did claim no less</div>
                              <div class="line">Than what he stood for, so his gracious nature</div>
                              <div class="line">Would think upon you for your voices and</div>
                              <div class="line">Translate his malice towards you into love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Standing your friendly lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus to have said,</div>
                              <div class="line">As you were fore-advised, had touch'd his spirit</div>
                              <div class="line">And tried his inclination; from him pluck'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Either his gracious promise, which you might,</div>
                              <div class="line">As cause had call'd you up, have held him to</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else it would have gall'd his surly nature,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which easily endures not article</div>
                              <div class="line">Tying him to aught; so putting him to rage,</div>
                              <div class="line">You should have ta'en the advantage of his choler</div>
                              <div class="line">And pass'd him unelected.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Did you perceive</div>
                              <div class="line">He did solicit you in free contempt</div>
                              <div class="line">When he did need your loves, and do you think</div>
                              <div class="line">That his contempt shall not be bruising to you,</div>
                              <div class="line">When he hath power to crush? Why, had your bodies</div>
                              <div class="line">No heart among you? or had you tongues to cry</div>
                              <div class="line">Against the rectorship of judgment?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere now denied the asker? and now again</div>
                              <div class="line">Of him that did not ask, but mock, bestow</div>
                              <div class="line">Your sued-for tongues?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">He's not confirm'd; we may deny him yet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">And will deny him:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll have five hundred voices of that sound.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">I twice five hundred and their friends to piece 'em.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Get you hence instantly, and tell those friends,</div>
                              <div class="line">They have chose a consul that will from them take</div>
                              <div class="line">Their liberties; make them of no more voice</div>
                              <div class="line">Than dogs that are as often beat for barking</div>
                              <div class="line">As therefore kept to do so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let them assemble,</div>
                              <div class="line">And on a safer judgment all revoke</div>
                              <div class="line">Your ignorant election; enforce his pride,</div>
                              <div class="line">And his old hate unto you; besides, forget not</div>
                              <div class="line">With what contempt he wore the humble weed,</div>
                              <div class="line">How in his suit he scorn'd you; but your loves,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thinking upon his services, took from you</div>
                              <div class="line">The apprehension of his present portance,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which most gibingly, ungravely, he did fashion</div>
                              <div class="line">After the inveterate hate he bears you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Lay</div>
                              <div class="line">A fault on us, your tribunes; that we laboured,</div>
                              <div class="line">No impediment between, but that you must</div>
                              <div class="line">Cast your election on him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, you chose him</div>
                              <div class="line">More after our commandment than as guided</div>
                              <div class="line">By your own true affections, and that your minds,</div>
                              <div class="line">Preoccupied with what you rather must do</div>
                              <div class="line">Than what you should, made you against the grain</div>
                              <div class="line">To voice him consul: lay the fault on us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, spare us not. Say we read lectures to you.</div>
                              <div class="line">How youngly he began to serve his country,</div>
                              <div class="line">How long continued, and what stock he springs of,</div>
                              <div class="line">The noble house o' the Marcians, from whence came</div>
                              <div class="line">That Ancus Marcius, Numa's daughter's son,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, after great Hostilius, here was king;</div>
                              <div class="line">Of the same house Publius and Quintus were,</div>
                              <div class="line">That our beat water brought by conduits hither;</div>
                              <div class="line">And  <span>Censorinus,</span>  nobly named so,</div>
                              <div class="line">Twice being  <span>by the people chosen</span>  censor,</div>
                              <div class="line">Was his great ancestor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">One thus descended,</div>
                              <div class="line">That hath beside well in his person wrought</div>
                              <div class="line">To be set high in place, we did commend</div>
                              <div class="line">To your remembrances: but you have found,</div>
                              <div class="line">Scaling his present bearing with his past,</div>
                              <div class="line">That he's your fixed enemy, and revoke</div>
                              <div class="line">Your sudden approbation.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, you ne'er had done't--</div>
                              <div class="line">Harp on that still--but by our putting on;</div>
                              <div class="line">And presently, when you have drawn your number,</div>
                              <div class="line">Repair to the Capitol.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">All</div>
                              <div class="line">We will so: almost all</div>
                              <div class="line">Repent in their election.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt Citizens</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let them go on;</div>
                              <div class="line">This mutiny were better put in hazard,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than stay, past doubt, for greater:</div>
                              <div class="line">If, as his nature is, he fall in rage</div>
                              <div class="line">With their refusal, both observe and answer</div>
                              <div class="line">The vantage of his anger.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">To the Capitol, come:</div>
                              <div class="line">We will be there before the stream o' the people;</div>
                              <div class="line">And this shall seem, as partly 'tis, their own,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which we have goaded onward.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 3. ACT III</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  Rome. A street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  A room in CORIOLANUS'S house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE III.  The same. The Forum.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Rome. A street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Cornets. Enter CORIOLANUS, MENENIUS, all the
Gentry, COMINIUS, TITUS LARTIUS, and other Senators</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Tullus Aufidius then had made new head?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LARTIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">He had, my lord; and that it was which caused</div>
                              <div class="line">Our swifter composition.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">So then the Volsces stand but as at first,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ready, when time shall prompt them, to make road.</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon's again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">They are worn, lord consul, so,</div>
                              <div class="line">That we shall hardly in our ages see</div>
                              <div class="line">Their banners wave again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Saw you Aufidius?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LARTIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">On safe-guard he came to me; and did curse</div>
                              <div class="line">Against the Volsces, for they had so vilely</div>
                              <div class="line">Yielded the town: he is retired to Antium.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Spoke he of me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LARTIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">He did, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How? what?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LARTIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How often he had met you, sword to sword;</div>
                              <div class="line">That of all things upon the earth he hated</div>
                              <div class="line">Your person most, that he would pawn his fortunes</div>
                              <div class="line">To hopeless restitution, so he might</div>
                              <div class="line">Be call'd your vanquisher.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">At Antium lives he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LARTIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">At Antium.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I wish I had a cause to seek him there,</div>
                              <div class="line">To oppose his hatred fully. Welcome home.</div>
                              <p>Enter SICINIUS and BRUTUS</p>
                              <div class="line">Behold, these are the tribunes of the people,</div>
                              <div class="line">The tongues o' the common mouth: I do despise them;</div>
                              <div class="line">For they do prank them in authority,</div>
                              <div class="line">Against all noble sufferance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Pass no further.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha! what is that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">It will be dangerous to go on: no further.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What makes this change?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">The matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath he not pass'd the noble and the common?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Cominius, no.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Have I had children's voices?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">Tribunes, give way; he shall to the market-place.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">The people are incensed against him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Stop,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or all will fall in broil.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Are these your herd?</div>
                              <div class="line">Must these have voices, that can yield them now</div>
                              <div class="line">And straight disclaim their tongues? What are</div>
                              <div class="line">your offices?</div>
                              <div class="line">You being their mouths, why rule you not their teeth?</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you not set them on?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Be calm, be calm.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a purposed thing, and grows by plot,</div>
                              <div class="line">To curb the will of the nobility:</div>
                              <div class="line">Suffer't, and live with such as cannot rule</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor ever will be ruled.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Call't not a plot:</div>
                              <div class="line">The people cry you mock'd them, and of late,</div>
                              <div class="line">When corn was given them gratis, you repined;</div>
                              <div class="line">Scandal'd the suppliants for the people, call'd them</div>
                              <div class="line">Time-pleasers, flatterers, foes to nobleness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, this was known before.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Not to them all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you inform'd them sithence?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How! I inform them!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You are like to do such business.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Not unlike,</div>
                              <div class="line">Each way, to better yours.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why then should I be consul? By yond clouds,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me deserve so ill as you, and make me</div>
                              <div class="line">Your fellow tribune.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You show too much of that</div>
                              <div class="line">For which the people stir: if you will pass</div>
                              <div class="line">To where you are bound, you must inquire your way,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which you are out of, with a gentler spirit,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or never be so noble as a consul,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor yoke with him for tribune.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's be calm.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">The people are abused; set on. This paltering</div>
                              <div class="line">Becomes not Rome, nor has Coriolanus</div>
                              <div class="line">Deserved this so dishonour'd rub, laid falsely</div>
                              <div class="line">I' the plain way of his merit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell me of corn!</div>
                              <div class="line">This was my speech, and I will speak't again--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Not now, not now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">Not in this heat, sir, now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, as I live, I will. My nobler friends,</div>
                              <div class="line">I crave their pardons:</div>
                              <div class="line">For the mutable, rank-scented many, let them</div>
                              <div class="line">Regard me as I do not flatter, and</div>
                              <div class="line">Therein behold themselves: I say again,</div>
                              <div class="line">In soothing them, we nourish 'gainst our senate</div>
                              <div class="line">The cockle of rebellion, insolence, sedition,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which we ourselves have plough'd for, sow'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">and scatter'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">By mingling them with us, the honour'd number,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who lack not virtue, no, nor power, but that</div>
                              <div class="line">Which they have given to beggars.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, no more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">No more words, we beseech you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How! no more!</div>
                              <div class="line">As for my country I have shed my blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not fearing outward force, so shall my lungs</div>
                              <div class="line">Coin words till their decay against those measles,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which we disdain should tatter us, yet sought</div>
                              <div class="line">The very way to catch them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You speak o' the people,</div>
                              <div class="line">As if you were a god to punish, not</div>
                              <div class="line">A man of their infirmity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twere well</div>
                              <div class="line">We let the people know't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What, what? his choler?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Choler!</div>
                              <div class="line">Were I as patient as the midnight sleep,</div>
                              <div class="line">By Jove, 'twould be my mind!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a mind</div>
                              <div class="line">That shall remain a poison where it is,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not poison any further.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall remain!</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear you this Triton of the minnows? mark you</div>
                              <div class="line">His absolute 'shall'?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas from the canon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Shall'!</div>
                              <div class="line">O good but most unwise patricians! why,</div>
                              <div class="line">You grave but reckless senators, have you thus</div>
                              <div class="line">Given Hydra here to choose an officer,</div>
                              <div class="line">That with his peremptory 'shall,' being but</div>
                              <div class="line">The horn and noise o' the monster's, wants not spirit</div>
                              <div class="line">To say he'll turn your current in a ditch,</div>
                              <div class="line">And make your channel his? If he have power</div>
                              <div class="line">Then vail your ignorance; if none, awake</div>
                              <div class="line">Your dangerous lenity. If you are learn'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Be not as common fools; if you are not,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let them have cushions by you. You are plebeians,</div>
                              <div class="line">If they be senators: and they are no less,</div>
                              <div class="line">When, both your voices blended, the great'st taste</div>
                              <div class="line">Most palates theirs. They choose their magistrate,</div>
                              <div class="line">And such a one as he, who puts his 'shall,'</div>
                              <div class="line">His popular 'shall' against a graver bench</div>
                              <div class="line">Than ever frown in Greece. By Jove himself!</div>
                              <div class="line">It makes the consuls base: and my soul aches</div>
                              <div class="line">To know, when two authorities are up,</div>
                              <div class="line">Neither supreme, how soon confusion</div>
                              <div class="line">May enter 'twixt the gap of both and take</div>
                              <div class="line">The one by the other.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, on to the market-place.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Whoever gave that counsel, to give forth</div>
                              <div class="line">The corn o' the storehouse gratis, as 'twas used</div>
                              <div class="line">Sometime in Greece,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, well, no more of that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Though there the people had more absolute power,</div>
                              <div class="line">I say, they nourish'd disobedience, fed</div>
                              <div class="line">The ruin of the state.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, shall the people give</div>
                              <div class="line">One that speaks thus their voice?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll give my reasons,</div>
                              <div class="line">More worthier than their voices. They know the corn</div>
                              <div class="line">Was not our recompense, resting well assured</div>
                              <div class="line">That ne'er did service for't: being press'd to the war,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even when the navel of the state was touch'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">They would not thread the gates. This kind of service</div>
                              <div class="line">Did not deserve corn gratis. Being i' the war</div>
                              <div class="line">Their mutinies and revolts, wherein they show'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Most valour, spoke not for them: the accusation</div>
                              <div class="line">Which they have often made against the senate,</div>
                              <div class="line">All cause unborn, could never be the motive</div>
                              <div class="line">Of our so frank donation. Well, what then?</div>
                              <div class="line">How shall this bisson multitude digest</div>
                              <div class="line">The senate's courtesy? Let deeds express</div>
                              <div class="line">What's like to be their words: 'we did request it;</div>
                              <div class="line">We are the greater poll, and in true fear</div>
                              <div class="line">They gave us our demands.' Thus we debase</div>
                              <div class="line">The nature of our seats and make the rabble</div>
                              <div class="line">Call our cares fears; which will in time</div>
                              <div class="line">Break ope the locks o' the senate and bring in</div>
                              <div class="line">The crows to peck the eagles.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, enough.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Enough, with over-measure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No, take more:</div>
                              <div class="line">What may be sworn by, both divine and human,</div>
                              <div class="line">Seal what I end withal! This double worship,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where one part does disdain with cause, the other</div>
                              <div class="line">Insult without all reason, where gentry, title, wisdom,</div>
                              <div class="line">Cannot conclude but by the yea and no</div>
                              <div class="line">Of general ignorance,--it must omit</div>
                              <div class="line">Real necessities, and give way the while</div>
                              <div class="line">To unstable slightness: purpose so barr'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">it follows,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing is done to purpose. Therefore, beseech you,--</div>
                              <div class="line">You that will be less fearful than discreet,</div>
                              <div class="line">That love the fundamental part of state</div>
                              <div class="line">More than you doubt the change on't, that prefer</div>
                              <div class="line">A noble life before a long, and wish</div>
                              <div class="line">To jump a body with a dangerous physic</div>
                              <div class="line">That's sure of death without it, at once pluck out</div>
                              <div class="line">The multitudinous tongue; let them not lick</div>
                              <div class="line">The sweet which is their poison: your dishonour</div>
                              <div class="line">Mangles true judgment and bereaves the state</div>
                              <div class="line">Of that integrity which should become't,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not having the power to do the good it would,</div>
                              <div class="line">For the in which doth control't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Has said enough.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Has spoken like a traitor, and shall answer</div>
                              <div class="line">As traitors do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou wretch, despite o'erwhelm thee!</div>
                              <div class="line">What should the people do with these bald tribunes?</div>
                              <div class="line">On whom depending, their obedience fails</div>
                              <div class="line">To the greater bench: in a rebellion,</div>
                              <div class="line">When what's not meet, but what must be, was law,</div>
                              <div class="line">Then were they chosen: in a better hour,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let what is meet be said it must be meet,</div>
                              <div class="line">And throw their power i' the dust.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Manifest treason!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">This a consul? no.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">The aediles, ho!</div>
                              <p>Enter an AEdile</p>
                              <div class="line">Let him be apprehended.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, call the people:</div>
                              <p>Exit AEdile</p>
                              <div class="line">in whose name myself</div>
                              <div class="line">Attach thee as a traitorous innovator,</div>
                              <div class="line">A foe to the public weal: obey, I charge thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">And follow to thine answer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hence, old goat!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Senators, &C</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll surety him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Aged sir, hands off.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hence, rotten thing! or I shall shake thy bones</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of thy garments.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Help, ye citizens!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a rabble of Citizens (Plebeians), with
the AEdiles</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">On both sides more respect.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's he that would take from you all your power.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Seize him, AEdiles!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">Down with him! down with him!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Senators, &C</div>
                              <div class="line">Weapons, weapons, weapons!</div>
                              <p>They all bustle about CORIOLANUS, crying</p>
                              <div class="line">'Tribunes!' 'Patricians!' 'Citizens!' 'What, ho!'</div>
                              <div class="line">'Sicinius!' 'Brutus!' 'Coriolanus!' 'Citizens!'</div>
                              <div class="line">'Peace, peace, peace!' 'Stay, hold, peace!'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What is about to be? I am out of breath;</div>
                              <div class="line">Confusion's near; I cannot speak. You, tribunes</div>
                              <div class="line">To the people! Coriolanus, patience!</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak, good Sicinius.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear me, people; peace!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's hear our tribune: peace Speak, speak, speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You are at point to lose your liberties:</div>
                              <div class="line">Marcius would have all from you; Marcius,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom late you have named for consul.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, fie, fie!</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the way to kindle, not to quench.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">To unbuild the city and to lay all flat.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What is the city but the people?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">True,</div>
                              <div class="line">The people are the city.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By the consent of all, we were establish'd</div>
                              <div class="line">The people's magistrates.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">You so remain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And so are like to do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">That is the way to lay the city flat;</div>
                              <div class="line">To bring the roof to the foundation,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bury all, which yet distinctly ranges,</div>
                              <div class="line">In heaps and piles of ruin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">This deserves death.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Or let us stand to our authority,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or let us lose it. We do here pronounce,</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the part o' the people, in whose power</div>
                              <div class="line">We were elected theirs, Marcius is worthy</div>
                              <div class="line">Of present death.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore lay hold of him;</div>
                              <div class="line">Bear him to the rock Tarpeian, and from thence</div>
                              <div class="line">Into destruction cast him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">AEdiles, seize him!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">Yield, Marcius, yield!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear me one word;</div>
                              <div class="line">Beseech you, tribunes, hear me but a word.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEdile</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace, peace!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To BRUTUS</span>  Be that you seem, truly your</div>
                              <div class="line">country's friend,</div>
                              <div class="line">And temperately proceed to what you would</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus violently redress.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, those cold ways,</div>
                              <div class="line">That seem like prudent helps, are very poisonous</div>
                              <div class="line">Where the disease is violent. Lay hands upon him,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bear him to the rock.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No, I'll die here.</div>
                              <p>Drawing his sword</p>
                              <div class="line">There's some among you have beheld me fighting:</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, try upon yourselves what you have seen me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Down with that sword! Tribunes, withdraw awhile.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Lay hands upon him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Help Marcius, help,</div>
                              <div class="line">You that be noble; help him, young and old!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">Down with him, down with him!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>In this mutiny, the Tribunes, the AEdiles, and the
People, are beat in</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, get you to your house; be gone, away!</div>
                              <div class="line">All will be naught else.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">Get you gone.</div>
                           </div>
