                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand fast;</div>
                              <div class="line">We have as many friends as enemies.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sham it be put to that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">The gods forbid!</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, noble friend, home to thy house;</div>
                              <div class="line">Leave us to cure this cause.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">For 'tis a sore upon us,</div>
                              <div class="line">You cannot tent yourself: be gone, beseech you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, sir, along with us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I would they were barbarians--as they are,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though in Rome litter'd--not Romans--as they are not,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though calved i' the porch o' the Capitol--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Be gone;</div>
                              <div class="line">Put not your worthy rage into your tongue;</div>
                              <div class="line">One time will owe another.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">On fair ground</div>
                              <div class="line">I could beat forty of them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I could myself</div>
                              <div class="line">Take up a brace o' the best of them; yea, the</div>
                              <div class="line">two tribunes:</div>
                              <div class="line">But now 'tis odds beyond arithmetic;</div>
                              <div class="line">And manhood is call'd foolery, when it stands</div>
                              <div class="line">Against a falling fabric. Will you hence,</div>
                              <div class="line">Before the tag return? whose rage doth rend</div>
                              <div class="line">Like interrupted waters and o'erbear</div>
                              <div class="line">What they are used to bear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, be gone:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll try whether my old wit be in request</div>
                              <div class="line">With those that have but little: this must be patch'd</div>
                              <div class="line">With cloth of any colour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, come away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt CORIOLANUS, COMINIUS, and others</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">A Patrician</div>
                              <div class="line">This man has marr'd his fortune.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">His nature is too noble for the world:</div>
                              <div class="line">He would not flatter Neptune for his trident,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or Jove for's power to thunder. His heart's his mouth:</div>
                              <div class="line">What his breast forges, that his tongue must vent;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, being angry, does forget that ever</div>
                              <div class="line">He heard the name of death.</div>
                              <p>A noise within</p>
                              <div class="line">Here's goodly work!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Patrician</div>
                              <div class="line">I would they were abed!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I would they were in Tiber! What the vengeance!</div>
                              <div class="line">Could he not speak 'em fair?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter BRUTUS and SICINIUS, with the rabble</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is this viper</div>
                              <div class="line">That would depopulate the city and</div>
                              <div class="line">Be every man himself?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You worthy tribunes,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">He shall be thrown down the Tarpeian rock</div>
                              <div class="line">With rigorous hands: he hath resisted law,</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore law shall scorn him further trial</div>
                              <div class="line">Than the severity of the public power</div>
                              <div class="line">Which he so sets at nought.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Citizen</div>
                              <div class="line">He shall well know</div>
                              <div class="line">The noble tribunes are the people's mouths,</div>
                              <div class="line">And we their hands.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">He shall, sure on't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, sir,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not cry havoc, where you should but hunt</div>
                              <div class="line">With modest warrant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, how comes't that you</div>
                              <div class="line">Have holp to make this rescue?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear me speak:</div>
                              <div class="line">As I do know the consul's worthiness,</div>
                              <div class="line">So can I name his faults,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Consul! what consul?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">The consul Coriolanus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">He consul!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">No, no, no, no, no.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">If, by the tribunes' leave, and yours, good people,</div>
                              <div class="line">I may be heard, I would crave a word or two;</div>
                              <div class="line">The which shall turn you to no further harm</div>
                              <div class="line">Than so much loss of time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak briefly then;</div>
                              <div class="line">For we are peremptory to dispatch</div>
                              <div class="line">This viperous traitor: to eject him hence</div>
                              <div class="line">Were but one danger, and to keep him here</div>
                              <div class="line">Our certain death: therefore it is decreed</div>
                              <div class="line">He dies to-night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Now the good gods forbid</div>
                              <div class="line">That our renowned Rome, whose gratitude</div>
                              <div class="line">Towards her deserved children is enroll'd</div>
                              <div class="line">In Jove's own book, like an unnatural dam</div>
                              <div class="line">Should now eat up her own!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">He's a disease that must be cut away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O, he's a limb that has but a disease;</div>
                              <div class="line">Mortal, to cut it off; to cure it, easy.</div>
                              <div class="line">What has he done to Rome that's worthy death?</div>
                              <div class="line">Killing our enemies, the blood he hath lost--</div>
                              <div class="line">Which, I dare vouch, is more than that he hath,</div>
                              <div class="line">By many an ounce--he dropp'd it for his country;</div>
                              <div class="line">And what is left, to lose it by his country,</div>
                              <div class="line">Were to us all, that do't and suffer it,</div>
                              <div class="line">A brand to the end o' the world.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">This is clean kam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Merely awry: when he did love his country,</div>
                              <div class="line">It honour'd him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">The service of the foot</div>
                              <div class="line">Being once gangrened, is not then respected</div>
                              <div class="line">For what before it was.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll hear no more.</div>
                              <div class="line">Pursue him to his house, and pluck him thence:</div>
                              <div class="line">Lest his infection, being of catching nature,</div>
                              <div class="line">Spread further.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">One word more, one word.</div>
                              <div class="line">This tiger-footed rage, when it shall find</div>
                              <div class="line">The harm of unscann'd swiftness, will too late</div>
                              <div class="line">Tie leaden pounds to's heels. Proceed by process;</div>
                              <div class="line">Lest parties, as he is beloved, break out,</div>
                              <div class="line">And sack great Rome with Romans.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">If it were so,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What do ye talk?</div>
                              <div class="line">Have we not had a taste of his obedience?</div>
                              <div class="line">Our aediles smote? ourselves resisted? Come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Consider this: he has been bred i' the wars</div>
                              <div class="line">Since he could draw a sword, and is ill school'd</div>
                              <div class="line">In bolted language; meal and bran together</div>
                              <div class="line">He throws without distinction. Give me leave,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll go to him, and undertake to bring him</div>
                              <div class="line">Where he shall answer, by a lawful form,</div>
                              <div class="line">In peace, to his utmost peril.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">Noble tribunes,</div>
                              <div class="line">It is the humane way: the other course</div>
                              <div class="line">Will prove too bloody, and the end of it</div>
                              <div class="line">Unknown to the beginning.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Noble Menenius,</div>
                              <div class="line">Be you then as the people's officer.</div>
                              <div class="line">Masters, lay down your weapons.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Go not home.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Meet on the market-place. We'll attend you there:</div>
                              <div class="line">Where, if you bring not Marcius, we'll proceed</div>
                              <div class="line">In our first way.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll bring him to you.</div>
                              <p>To the Senators</p>
                              <div class="line">Let me desire your company: he must come,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or what is worst will follow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, let's to him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  A room in CORIOLANUS'S house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter CORIOLANUS with Patricians</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let them puff all about mine ears, present me</div>
                              <div class="line">Death on the wheel or at wild horses' heels,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or pile ten hills on the Tarpeian rock,</div>
                              <div class="line">That the precipitation might down stretch</div>
                              <div class="line">Below the beam of sight, yet will I still</div>
                              <div class="line">Be thus to them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">A Patrician</div>
                              <div class="line">You do the nobler.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I muse my mother</div>
                              <div class="line">Does not approve me further, who was wont</div>
                              <div class="line">To call them woollen vassals, things created</div>
                              <div class="line">To buy and sell with groats, to show bare heads</div>
                              <div class="line">In congregations, to yawn, be still and wonder,</div>
                              <div class="line">When one but of my ordinance stood up</div>
                              <div class="line">To speak of peace or war.</div>
                              <p>Enter VOLUMNIA</p>
                              <div class="line">I talk of you:</div>
                              <div class="line">Why did you wish me milder? would you have me</div>
                              <div class="line">False to my nature? Rather say I play</div>
                              <div class="line">The man I am.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VOLUMNIA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, sir, sir, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">I would have had you put your power well on,</div>
                              <div class="line">Before you had worn it out.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VOLUMNIA</div>
                              <div class="line">You might have been enough the man you are,</div>
                              <div class="line">With striving less to be so; lesser had been</div>
                              <div class="line">The thwartings of your dispositions, if</div>
                              <div class="line">You had not show'd them how ye were disposed</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere they lack'd power to cross you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let them hang.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">A Patrician</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and burn too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter MENENIUS and Senators</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, you have been too rough, something</div>
                              <div class="line">too rough;</div>
                              <div class="line">You must return and mend it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">There's no remedy;</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless, by not so doing, our good city</div>
                              <div class="line">Cleave in the midst, and perish.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VOLUMNIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray, be counsell'd:</div>
                              <div class="line">I have a heart as little apt as yours,</div>
                              <div class="line">But yet a brain that leads my use of anger</div>
                              <div class="line">To better vantage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well said, noble woman?</div>
                              <div class="line">Before he should thus stoop to the herd, but that</div>
                              <div class="line">The violent fit o' the time craves it as physic</div>
                              <div class="line">For the whole state, I would put mine armour on,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which I can scarcely bear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What must I do?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Return to the tribunes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, what then? what then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Repent what you have spoke.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">For them! I cannot do it to the gods;</div>
                              <div class="line">Must I then do't to them?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VOLUMNIA</div>
                              <div class="line">You are too absolute;</div>
                              <div class="line">Though therein you can never be too noble,</div>
                              <div class="line">But when extremities speak. I have heard you say,</div>
                              <div class="line">Honour and policy, like unsever'd friends,</div>
                              <div class="line">I' the war do grow together: grant that, and tell me,</div>
                              <div class="line">In peace what each of them by the other lose,</div>
                              <div class="line">That they combine not there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Tush, tush!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">A good demand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VOLUMNIA</div>
                              <div class="line">If it be honour in your wars to seem</div>
                              <div class="line">The same you are not, which, for your best ends,</div>
                              <div class="line">You adopt your policy, how is it less or worse,</div>
                              <div class="line">That it shall hold companionship in peace</div>
                              <div class="line">With honour, as in war, since that to both</div>
                              <div class="line">It stands in like request?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why force you this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VOLUMNIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Because that now it lies you on to speak</div>
                              <div class="line">To the people; not by your own instruction,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor by the matter which your heart prompts you,</div>
                              <div class="line">But with such words that are but rooted in</div>
                              <div class="line">Your tongue, though but bastards and syllables</div>
                              <div class="line">Of no allowance to your bosom's truth.</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, this no more dishonours you at all</div>
                              <div class="line">Than to take in a town with gentle words,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which else would put you to your fortune and</div>
                              <div class="line">The hazard of much blood.</div>
                              <div class="line">I would dissemble with my nature where</div>
                              <div class="line">My fortunes and my friends at stake required</div>
                              <div class="line">I should do so in honour: I am in this,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your wife, your son, these senators, the nobles;</div>
                              <div class="line">And you will rather show our general louts</div>
                              <div class="line">How you can frown than spend a fawn upon 'em,</div>
                              <div class="line">For the inheritance of their loves and safeguard</div>
                              <div class="line">Of what that want might ruin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Noble lady!</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, go with us; speak fair: you may salve so,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not what is dangerous present, but the loss</div>
                              <div class="line">Of what is past.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VOLUMNIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee now, my son,</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to them, with this bonnet in thy hand;</div>
                              <div class="line">And thus far having stretch'd it--here be with them--</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy knee bussing the stones--for in such business</div>
                              <div class="line">Action is eloquence, and the eyes of the ignorant</div>
                              <div class="line">More learned than the ears--waving thy head,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which often, thus, correcting thy stout heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">Now humble as the ripest mulberry</div>
                              <div class="line">That will not hold the handling: or say to them,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art their soldier, and being bred in broils</div>
                              <div class="line">Hast not the soft way which, thou dost confess,</div>
                              <div class="line">Were fit for thee to use as they to claim,</div>
                              <div class="line">In asking their good loves, but thou wilt frame</div>
                              <div class="line">Thyself, forsooth, hereafter theirs, so far</div>
                              <div class="line">As thou hast power and person.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">This but done,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even as she speaks, why, their hearts were yours;</div>
                              <div class="line">For they have pardons, being ask'd, as free</div>
                              <div class="line">As words to little purpose.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VOLUMNIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee now,</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, and be ruled: although I know thou hadst rather</div>
                              <div class="line">Follow thine enemy in a fiery gulf</div>
                              <div class="line">Than flatter him in a bower. Here is Cominius.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter COMINIUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I have been i' the market-place; and, sir,'tis fit</div>
                              <div class="line">You make strong party, or defend yourself</div>
                              <div class="line">By calmness or by absence: all's in anger.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Only fair speech.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I think 'twill serve, if he</div>
                              <div class="line">Can thereto frame his spirit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VOLUMNIA</div>
                              <div class="line">He must, and will</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee now, say you will, and go about it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Must I go show them my unbarbed sconce?</div>
                              <div class="line">Must I with base tongue give my noble heart</div>
                              <div class="line">A lie that it must bear? Well, I will do't:</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet, were there but this single plot to lose,</div>
                              <div class="line">This mould of Marcius, they to dust should grind it</div>
                              <div class="line">And throw't against the wind. To the market-place!</div>
                              <div class="line">You have put me now to such a part which never</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall discharge to the life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, we'll prompt you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VOLUMNIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee now, sweet son, as thou hast said</div>
                              <div class="line">My praises made thee first a soldier, so,</div>
                              <div class="line">To have my praise for this, perform a part</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast not done before.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I must do't:</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, my disposition, and possess me</div>
                              <div class="line">Some harlot's spirit! my throat of war be turn'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which quired with my drum, into a pipe</div>
                              <div class="line">Small as an eunuch, or the virgin voice</div>
                              <div class="line">That babies lulls asleep! the smiles of knaves</div>
                              <div class="line">Tent in my cheeks, and schoolboys' tears take up</div>
                              <div class="line">The glasses of my sight! a beggar's tongue</div>
                              <div class="line">Make motion through my lips, and my arm'd knees,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who bow'd but in my stirrup, bend like his</div>
                              <div class="line">That hath received an alms! I will not do't,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lest I surcease to honour mine own truth</div>
                              <div class="line">And by my body's action teach my mind</div>
                              <div class="line">A most inherent baseness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VOLUMNIA</div>
                              <div class="line">At thy choice, then:</div>
                              <div class="line">To beg of thee, it is my more dishonour</div>
                              <div class="line">Than thou of them. Come all to ruin; let</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy mother rather feel thy pride than fear</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy dangerous stoutness, for I mock at death</div>
                              <div class="line">With as big heart as thou. Do as thou list</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy valiantness was mine, thou suck'dst it from me,</div>
                              <div class="line">But owe thy pride thyself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray, be content:</div>
                              <div class="line">Mother, I am going to the market-place;</div>
                              <div class="line">Chide me no more. I'll mountebank their loves,</div>
                              <div class="line">Cog their hearts from them, and come home beloved</div>
                              <div class="line">Of all the trades in Rome. Look, I am going:</div>
                              <div class="line">Commend me to my wife. I'll return consul;</div>
                              <div class="line">Or never trust to what my tongue can do</div>
                              <div class="line">I' the way of flattery further.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VOLUMNIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Do your will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Away! the tribunes do attend you: arm yourself</div>
                              <div class="line">To answer mildly; for they are prepared</div>
                              <div class="line">With accusations, as I hear, more strong</div>
                              <div class="line">Than are upon you yet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">The word is 'mildly.' Pray you, let us go:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let them accuse me by invention, I</div>
                              <div class="line">Will answer in mine honour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, but mildly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, mildly be it then. Mildly!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  The same. The Forum.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter SICINIUS and BRUTUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">In this point charge him home, that he affects</div>
                              <div class="line">Tyrannical power: if he evade us there,</div>
                              <div class="line">Enforce him with his envy to the people,</div>
                              <div class="line">And that the spoil got on the Antiates</div>
                              <div class="line">Was ne'er distributed.</div>
                              <p>Enter an AEdile</p>
                              <div class="line">What, will he come?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEdile</div>
                              <div class="line">He's coming.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How accompanied?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEdile</div>
                              <div class="line">With old Menenius, and those senators</div>
                              <div class="line">That always favour'd him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you a catalogue</div>
                              <div class="line">Of all the voices that we have procured</div>
                              <div class="line">Set down by the poll?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEdile</div>
                              <div class="line">I have; 'tis ready.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you collected them by tribes?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEdile</div>
                              <div class="line">I have.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Assemble presently the people hither;</div>
                              <div class="line">And when they bear me say 'It shall be so</div>
                              <div class="line">I' the right and strength o' the commons,' be it either</div>
                              <div class="line">For death, for fine, or banishment, then let them</div>
                              <div class="line">If I say fine, cry 'Fine;' if death, cry 'Death.'</div>
                              <div class="line">Insisting on the old prerogative</div>
                              <div class="line">And power i' the truth o' the cause.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEdile</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall inform them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And when such time they have begun to cry,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let them not cease, but with a din confused</div>
                              <div class="line">Enforce the present execution</div>
                              <div class="line">Of what we chance to sentence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEdile</div>
                              <div class="line">Very well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Make them be strong and ready for this hint,</div>
                              <div class="line">When we shall hap to give 't them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Go about it.</div>
                              <p>Exit AEdile</p>
                              <div class="line">Put him to choler straight: he hath been used</div>
                              <div class="line">Ever to conquer, and to have his worth</div>
                              <div class="line">Of contradiction: being once chafed, he cannot</div>
                              <div class="line">Be rein'd again to temperance; then he speaks</div>
                              <div class="line">What's in his heart; and that is there which looks</div>
                              <div class="line">With us to break his neck.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, here he comes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter CORIOLANUS, MENENIUS, and COMINIUS,
with Senators and Patricians</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Calmly, I do beseech you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, as an ostler, that for the poorest piece</div>
                              <div class="line">Will bear the knave by the volume. The honour'd gods</div>
                              <div class="line">Keep Rome in safety, and the chairs of justice</div>
                              <div class="line">Supplied with worthy men! plant love among 's!</div>
                              <div class="line">Throng our large temples with the shows of peace,</div>
                              <div class="line">And not our streets with war!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">Amen, amen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">A noble wish.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter AEdile, with Citizens</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Draw near, ye people.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEdile</div>
                              <div class="line">List to your tribunes. Audience: peace, I say!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">First, hear me speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Both Tribunes</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, say. Peace, ho!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I be charged no further than this present?</div>
                              <div class="line">Must all determine here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I do demand,</div>
                              <div class="line">If you submit you to the people's voices,</div>
                              <div class="line">Allow their officers and are content</div>
                              <div class="line">To suffer lawful censure for such faults</div>
                              <div class="line">As shall be proved upon you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I am content.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Lo, citizens, he says he is content:</div>
                              <div class="line">The warlike service he has done, consider; think</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the wounds his body bears, which show</div>
                              <div class="line">Like graves i' the holy churchyard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Scratches with briers,</div>
                              <div class="line">Scars to move laughter only.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Consider further,</div>
                              <div class="line">That when he speaks not like a citizen,</div>
                              <div class="line">You find him like a soldier: do not take</div>
                              <div class="line">His rougher accents for malicious sounds,</div>
                              <div class="line">But, as I say, such as become a soldier,</div>
                              <div class="line">Rather than envy you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, well, no more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What is the matter</div>
                              <div class="line">That being pass'd for consul with full voice,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am so dishonour'd that the very hour</div>
                              <div class="line">You take it off again?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Answer to us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, then: 'tis true, I ought so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">We charge you, that you have contrived to take</div>
                              <div class="line">From Rome all season'd office and to wind</div>
                              <div class="line">Yourself into a power tyrannical;</div>
                              <div class="line">For which you are a traitor to the people.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How! traitor!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, temperately; your promise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">The fires i' the lowest hell fold-in the people!</div>
                              <div class="line">Call me their traitor! Thou injurious tribune!</div>
                              <div class="line">Within thine eyes sat twenty thousand deaths,</div>
                              <div class="line">In thy hand clutch'd as many millions, in</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy lying tongue both numbers, I would say</div>
                              <div class="line">'Thou liest' unto thee with a voice as free</div>
                              <div class="line">As I do pray the gods.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Mark you this, people?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">To the rock, to the rock with him!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace!</div>
                              <div class="line">We need not put new matter to his charge:</div>
                              <div class="line">What you have seen him do and heard him speak,</div>
                              <div class="line">Beating your officers, cursing yourselves,</div>
                              <div class="line">Opposing laws with strokes and here defying</div>
                              <div class="line">Those whose great power must try him; even this,</div>
                              <div class="line">So criminal and in such capital kind,</div>
                              <div class="line">Deserves the extremest death.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">But since he hath</div>
                              <div class="line">Served well for Rome,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What do you prate of service?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I talk of that, that know it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MENENIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this the promise that you made your mother?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Know, I pray you,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I know no further:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let them pronounce the steep Tarpeian death,</div>
                              <div class="line">Vagabond exile, raying, pent to linger</div>
                              <div class="line">But with a grain a day, I would not buy</div>
                              <div class="line">Their mercy at the price of one fair word;</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor cheque my courage for what they can give,</div>
                              <div class="line">To have't with saying 'Good morrow.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">For that he has,</div>
                              <div class="line">As much as in him lies, from time to time</div>
                              <div class="line">Envied against the people, seeking means</div>
                              <div class="line">To pluck away their power, as now at last</div>
                              <div class="line">Given hostile strokes, and that not in the presence</div>
                              <div class="line">Of dreaded justice, but on the ministers</div>
                              <div class="line">That do distribute it; in the name o' the people</div>
                              <div class="line">And in the power of us the tribunes, we,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even from this instant, banish him our city,</div>
                              <div class="line">In peril of precipitation</div>
                              <div class="line">From off the rock Tarpeian never more</div>
                              <div class="line">To enter our Rome gates: i' the people's name,</div>
                              <div class="line">I say it shall be so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">It shall be so, it shall be so; let him away:</div>
                              <div class="line">He's banish'd, and it shall be so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear me, my masters, and my common friends,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">He's sentenced; no more hearing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COMINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me speak:</div>
                              <div class="line">I have been consul, and can show for Rome</div>
                              <div class="line">Her enemies' marks upon me. I do love</div>
                              <div class="line">My country's good with a respect more tender,</div>
                              <div class="line">More holy and profound, than mine own life,</div>
                              <div class="line">My dear wife's estimate, her womb's increase,</div>
                              <div class="line">And treasure of my loins; then if I would</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak that,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">We know your drift: speak what?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRUTUS</div>
                              <div class="line">There's no more to be said, but he is banish'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">As enemy to the people and his country:</div>
                              <div class="line">It shall be so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">It shall be so, it shall be so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CORIOLANUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You common cry of curs! whose breath I hate</div>
                              <div class="line">As reek o' the rotten fens, whose loves I prize</div>
                              <div class="line">As the dead carcasses of unburied men</div>
                              <div class="line">That do corrupt my air, I banish you;</div>
                              <div class="line">And here remain with your uncertainty!</div>
                              <div class="line">Let every feeble rumour shake your hearts!</div>
                              <div class="line">Your enemies, with nodding of their plumes,</div>
                              <div class="line">Fan you into despair! Have the power still</div>
                              <div class="line">To banish your defenders; till at length</div>
                              <div class="line">Your ignorance, which finds not till it feels,</div>
                              <div class="line">Making not reservation of yourselves,</div>
                              <div class="line">Still your own foes, deliver you as most</div>
                              <div class="line">Abated captives to some nation</div>
                              <div class="line">That won you without blows! Despising,</div>
                              <div class="line">For you, the city, thus I turn my back:</div>
                              <div class="line">There is a world elsewhere.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt CORIOLANUS, COMINIUS, MENENIUS, Senators,
and Patricians</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">AEdile</div>
                              <div class="line">The people's enemy is gone, is gone!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">Our enemy is banish'd! he is gone! Hoo! hoo!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Shouting, and throwing up their caps</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SICINIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, see him out at gates, and follow him,</div>
                              <div class="line">As he hath followed you, with all despite;</div>
                              <div class="line">Give him deserved vexation. Let a guard</div>
                              <div class="line">Attend us through the city.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come; let's see him out at gates; come.</div>
                              <div class="line">The gods preserve our noble tribunes! Come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 4. ACT IV</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  Rome. Before a gate of the city.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  The same. A  street near the gate.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.4">3. SCENE III.  A highway between Rome and Antium.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
